content: One way is to press Alt key which should display menu bar. There may also be a hamburger menu in upper right.
creator: davidsk

content: Click view>layout>vertical view )and press F8 if messages are not viewable )
creator: davidsk

content: PLEASE do not post the same question twice. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: One possibility would be to switch to outlook dot com for your email account, as Godaddy is switching to Exchange.
creator: davidsk

content: Yahoo requires a different password when using an email client and requires OAUTH2 authentication. This URL may assist: https://help.yahoo.com/kb/SLN15241.html
creator: davidsk

content: Thanks for sharing that. SInce this is a beta, would you please share this experience on the beta forum at https://thunderbird.topicbox.com/groups/beta  ? Thank you for your participation.
creator: davidsk

content: You can attempt to recover the prior profile by clicking help>moretroubleshootinginformation, scroll down to 'profiles', click 'about:profiles' and see if the old profile is viewable and can be selected. If the accounts are POP, the message folders can be retrieved.
creator: davidsk
